### Problem 1.1
```{r}
library(rpart)
library(rpart.plot)
model <- rpart(Species ~ ., data = iris, method = 'class')
rpart.plot(model, extra=104, fallen.leaves=T, type=4, main="Iris Dataset Decision Tree")
```
